metadata.name: come to life.
metadata.description:
It is easy to become distracted and lose contact with yourself and your authenticity.  There is a part of you that notices the disconnection; from self, from others, from the present moment. 

This is your invitation...

come to life.

They’d heard tell of it happening…  
echoing only softly  
in those precious moments  
where stillness would undress  
and lie before them.  
  
Its gentle absence  
the only invitation  
any would receive.

For those to whom it mattered,  
bones spoke in open resonance  
and the call,  
once adrift on the wind  
began to settle  
where it would bed down  
amidst their dreams.

Compelling tales  
spoken to silence  
emerged  
and would tempt them forward  
to exhume and restore,  
after that long forgetting.

With separation in decline  
sensation  
remembrance

And each, in time  
would find an ember  
to nurture and gaze upon  
as they were drawn  
to awaken each other  
together.

Through union of purpose  
they gathered  
with those  
to whom it mattered.

~ waking nomad


To accept the invitation:  
- Close your eyes.  
- Listen.  
- Feel.  
- Notice who you are.  
- What now?

(quality headphones or stereo speakers highly encouraged)
